channel.title: 🏢 Academy for Engineering and Technology, Fudan University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Academy for Engineering and Technology, Fudan University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: PediatricsGPT: Large Language Models as Chinese Medical Assistants for Pediatric Applications
item.description: PediatricsGPT: a novel Chinese pediatric LLM assistant trained on a large, high-quality dataset (PedCorpus) outperforms existing models, paving the way for improved pediatric healthcare.
